name: Breath of the Wild Guardian
author: Timelord
info: A 1x1 BotW Guardian enemy that walks around and shoots lasers.
description: A 1x1 BotW Guardian enemy that walks around and shoots lasers.
setup: Please refer to the example quest.In the Enemy Editor, select and edit 'Guardian'The InitD fields are clearly marked. The laser shot damage is set as the enemy weapon damage.
